explanation:
code_hardening: none
resolve_compilation_errors: Qualified all key constants with java.awt.event.KeyEvent to match the existing imports and avoid undefined symbol errors; implemented the missing type(char) method required by existing callers.
exception_handling: none
logic_customization: Updated digit mappings '0'–'9' to use KeyEvent.VK_NUMPAD0–VK_NUMPAD9; replaced '<' and '>' mappings to use KeyEvent.VK_LESS and KeyEvent.VK_GREATER; left all other character-to-key and SHIFT combinations unchanged.
refactoring: none
misc: none
